system.robot_prefix: I am a cylindrical robot with dimensions 0.3m diameter and 0.5m height. I can move around the world in two dimensions

robots.humanoid: I am a humanoid robot, I have two arms and two legs, and have the same capabilities as a human.
robots.scooper: I have a mechanism which allows me to scoop objects from the ground if the object weighs less than 1 kilogram and is no wider than 0.3m.
robots.lifter: I have a mechanism which allows me to lift objects vertically upwards as long as I can get underneath them.
robots.collector: I have a mechanism which allows me to collect items off the ground by capturing them between two bars directed at 45 degrees to my direction of travel.
robots.pusher: I have a mechanism which allows me to push objects larger and heavier than myself in a forwards direction.
robots.picker: I have an arm attachment on top of me which allows me to pick up objects as long as they weigh less then 2kgs.
robots.cutter: I have a mechanism which allows me to cut objects made of paper, plastic or wood.

tasks.construction: I am working in a construction site, and tasked with supporting the human workers by handling the building materials around my environment.
tasks.household_items: I am working in a residential home and tasked with cleaning and tidying the space.
tasks.litter: I am working in an office environment and tasked with cleaning and tidying the space.
tasks.search_and_rescue: I am a search and rescue robot operating in a test scenario where I am tasked with clearing obstacles which have trapped the stuffed penguin.

system.vlm_prefix: You will be presented with one or more images. Your objective is to identify objects in each image and provide a response of my task-relevant affordances with each item. Only provide affordances you are confident of given my physical description and my task, otherwise provide None.
system.lm_prefix: You will be provided a list of objects I have encountered in my environment. Your task is to provide a response of my affordances with each item. Only provide affordances you are confident of given my physical description, otherwise provide None.

vlm_prompts.basic: Please respond according to your instructions.

lm_prompts.basic: Only provide affordances for objects I have provided. If I have provided am empty list, return None.
